string.name: emailConfirm_click
string.comment:
emailConfirm_click
Part of the confirmation email upon registering for a NewChess account.
The unique reset link is presented just after this string.

resources.string: Klik op die skakel om jou NewChess-rekening te aktiveer.
As jy nie by NewChess geregistreer het nie, kan jy hierdie boodskap veilig ignoreer.
